string.value: Would you like to participate in #rthe Mardi Gras Festival?#k If so, please see #bGaga.#k

Monsters attacked the storage room and looted the Beads we were saving up for the festival, stealing everything! If you eliminate the monsters and bring me #b10 Bead Necklaces#k, I'll make you #ra Mardi Gras Feather: Green, Purple, Red#k--whichever one you want!
You have returned with 10 Bead Necklaces that will be used in #bthe Mardi Gras Festival.#kYou can participate in this event until #rFebruary 21th, 2010.#k

Are you enjoying #bthe Mardi Gras Festival?#k Well, that makes one of us. As a member of the event committee, I'm worried sick about all the preparations. I could definitely use a helping hand. What do you say?

Beads are a must in a Mardi Gras Festival, wouldn't you say? Originally, we had made a bunch of Bead Necklaces for the 2010 Mardi Gras Festival. But vicious monsters broke into the storage room, stole all the Bead Necklaces, and made an incredible mess!

I need you to eliminate those monsters and bring back #r10 Bead Necklaces.#k Then I'll reward you #ba Green Mardi Gras Feather, a Purple Mardi Gras Feather, or a Gold Mardi Gras Feather.#k I'm counting on you, buddy!
How could you decline? Come back if you change your mind, but don't come too late. You can only participate until #rFebruary 21th, 2010.#k

No kiddin', you really brought them back. You weren't scared one bit fighting those monsters, eh? A big thanks to you, friend! Because of you, we'll now be able to enjoy the Mardi Gras festivities in 2010 as planned. Here, I have a reward for you.

Whenever you collect #b10 Mardi Gras Feathers#k of every color, you can receive a #rMardi Gras Mask.#k You can participate as many times as you want in this event until #rFebruary 21th, 2010,#k so come and see me frequently if you want that mask!
